name: Raspberry Streusel Muffins - simple
steps: In a large bowl, combine flour, sugar and baking powder. In a small bowl, blend milk butter and egg. Stir milk mixture into flour mixture just until moistened. Spoon about 1 Tbsp batter into each of the 12 greased muffin cups. Divide 1/2 of the raspberries among cups. Top with remaining batter then remaining raspberries. Combine topping ingredients until mixture resembles moist crumbs; sprinkle over muffins. Bake at 375 F for 20-25 minutes. Let stand for 5 minutes then carefully remove.
